argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nvmval.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | nvmval.2 | |- G = ( +v ` U ) |
| 3 |  | nvmval.4 | |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) |
| 4 |  | nvmval.3 | |- M = ( -v ` U ) |
| 5 | 2 | #P_nvgrp | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 6 | 1, 2 | #P_bafval | |- X = ran G |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( inv ` G ) = ( inv ` G ) |
| 8 | 2, 4 | #P_vsfval | |- M = ( /g ` G ) |
| 9 | 6, 7, 8 | #P_grpodivfval | |- ( G e. GrpOp -> M = ( x e. X , y e. X |-> ( x G ( ( inv ` G ) ` y ) ) ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> M = ( x e. X , y e. X |-> ( x G ( ( inv ` G ) ` y ) ) ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 3, 7 | #P_nvinv | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ y e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S y ) = ( ( inv ` G ) ` y ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ x e. X /\ y e. X ) -> ( -u 1 S y ) = ( ( inv ` G ) ` y ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ x e. X /\ y e. X ) -> ( x G ( -u 1 S y ) ) = ( x G ( ( inv ` G ) ` y ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_mpt2eq3dva | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> ( x e. X , y e. X |-> ( x G ( -u 1 S y ) ) ) = ( x e. X , y e. X |-> ( x G ( ( inv ` G ) ` y ) ) ) ) |
| 15 | 10, 14 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> M = ( x e. X , y e. X |-> ( x G ( -u 1 S y ) ) ) ) |
